name: matty stratton, charismatic grifter on pto

content.value:
Good thing I’m not tweeting about tech this week or else I might have to call out devternity.com for pretty much all white dudes as speakers. 

Given who they have listed at the top it doesn’t surprise me at all. 

Good thing I’m not tweeting about tech this week.
content.html: Good thing I’m not tweeting about tech this week or else I might have to call out devternity.com for pretty much all white dudes as speakers. Given who they have listed at the top it doesn’t surprise me at all. Good thing I’m not tweeting about tech this week.
